data.name: Thanos (Endgame)
data.description: When the Avengers' Time Heist went awry, Thanos was shown a future of his purpose fulfilled. Armed with that knowledge, he stepped into the future to ensure his inevitable destiny.

starItems.name: Thanos (Endgame)
starItems.description: When the Avengers' Time Heist went awry, Thanos was shown a future of his purpose fulfilled. Armed with that knowledge, he stepped into the future to ensure his inevitable destiny.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Repeat this attack once.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Reduce Speed Bar of primary target by <color=#86e619>5%</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

Repeat this attack once.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

Repeat this attack once.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

Repeat this attack once.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

Repeat this attack once.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

Repeat this attack once.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

Repeat this attack once.

1.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Copy <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect on this character and each ally to primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Copy <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect on this character and each ally to primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects on this character and each ally to primary target

3.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects on this character and each ally to primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent enemies

4.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects on this character and each ally to primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects on this character and each ally to primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Copy all negative effects on this character and each ally to primary target

6.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Copy all negative effects on this character and each ally to primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent enemies

7.description:
Barrier self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Exposed</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Copy all negative effects on this character and each ally to primary target.

Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect on self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect on self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects on self
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects on self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects on self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects on self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
Clear all negative effects on self
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Clear all negative effects on self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Reduce the duration of all positive effects on each enemy by <color=#86e619>2</color> (Any positive effect that has a duration of <color=#86e619>0</color> expires instantly, including <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>)

7.description:
Clear all negative effects on self + gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>270%</color> Piercing + reduce the duration of all positive effects on each enemy by <color=#86e619>2</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns (Any positive effect that has a duration of <color=#86e619>0</color> expires instantly, including <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>).

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

1.description:
The first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Clear all negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Drain.
 > This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.

Once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally or self that was not at full energy on start of the current turn.

2.description:
The first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Clear all negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Drain.
 > This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.

Once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally or self that was not at full energy on start of the current turn.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies or self

3.description:
The first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Clear all negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>15%</color> Drain.
 > This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.

Once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies or self that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
The attack when this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health gains +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Drain
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>

4.description:
The first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Clear all negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
 > This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.

Once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies or self that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing to all enemies
The first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, reduce the duration of all positive effects by <color=#86e619>5</color> on all enemies with +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus (Any positive effect that has a duration of <color=#86e619>0</color> expires instantly, including <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>)

5.description:
The first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Clear all negative effects on self and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies.
 > Reduce the duration of all positive effects by <color=#86e619>5</color> on all enemies (Any positive effect that has a duration of <color=#86e619>0</color> expires instantly, including <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>).
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus, is Unavoidable and cannot be Blocked or counterattacked.

Once per turn, when any enemy with <color=#fff568>Exposed</color> is attacked, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies or self that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>ANNIHILATOR</color> allies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
